input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Protective Neoprene Sleeve Cover for Dell Venue 8 / Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" Tablet

Item keywords:
Fashionable, lightweight & durable VanGoddy Neoprene Sleeve Cover
Neoprene tapestry cushions & protects your device against shock & impact
Front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories along-side your device
Dual zipper opening allows for quick & easy access to your device & accessories

Product description:
input_text.Response A: It's time to give your Dell Venue 8 / Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" Tablet the protection it deserves with VanGoddy's Neoprene Sleeve Cover. Made with high-quality neoprene, this cover is both fashionable and lightweight. The material is not only durable, but also cushions your device against shock and impact. The front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories, so you can carry everything you need in one place. With a dual zipper opening, you can access your device and accessories quickly and easily. Don't wait, protect your device today!
input_text.Response B:
Sing like a professional!
Your favorite new toy for karaoke! The Universal Mini Microphone is a versatile device that can be used with multiple singing applications. It's compatible with your smartphone and easy to use. Whether you're recording or streaming karaoke, this microphone will capture your voice with crystal-clear clarity. It's small enough to carry around with you anywhere, so you can sing whenever and wherever inspiration strikes. The microphone also has a built-in volume control, so you can adjust the recording levels to your liking. Get ready to make some noise!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
